attributes.action: Stop the merging of Fairfield and Kingstone High Schools, Herefordshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Herefordshire County Council propose to merge Fairfield High School with Kingstone High School.  Currently the thoughts are to close both schools and build a brand new school with a capacity slightly less of the two current schools combined.

This is proposed on the basis of empty places within the schools.

Fairfield High School is a unique and highly successful school, achieving 'outstanding' ratings from OFSTED and regularly sits in the top 50 UK state comprehensives.  A merge will bring no benefit to any pupil.
